meanings.definition: A compound containing the uranyl group.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied various uranyls in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Chemists often analyze uranyls to understand their properties.
meanings.sent3: The uranyls in the experiment seemed to dance under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of uranyls was as colorful as a rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used models to demonstrate the structure of uranyls.

meanings.definition: The bivalent radical UO2+2, derived from uranic acid.
meanings.sent1: The uranyls were crucial in the chemical reaction.
meanings.sent2: Miners discovered a new vein rich in uranyls.
meanings.sent3: The uranyls in the solution decided to throw a party.
meanings.sent4: His words hit her like a shower of uranyls.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a masterpiece inspired by the beauty of uranyls.
